name: Robot Drone
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Flame Jet
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (2d4+3) fire damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fueled Escape
bonus_actions.desc: The drone takes the Dash or Disengage action, leaving a small cloud of fuel fumes behind it. Each creature within 5 feet must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: The drone doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Construct Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The drone is immune to poison and psychic damage, and it is immune to exhaustion and the charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, and poisoned conditions.

special_abilities.name: Electrical Malfunction
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the drone takes lightning damage, it must succeed on a DC 11 WIS save or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Point-Blank Shots
special_abilities.desc: When the drone makes a ranged attack, it doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll from being within 5 feet of a hostile creature, though it may still have disadvantage from other sources.
